title: Avalara | SSE | Java I3
content:
Education: M.Tech., Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 2+
Prior Experience: SDE2 at reputed MNC
Current CTC :- 19LPA(Base) + 1.9L(Bonus) + PF = 21.8LPA
Experience: Java Backend Engineer

Company: Avalara
Title/Level: SSE - Java - I3
Salary: 28L (Base)
Annual Bonus: 2.8L (10% of Base)
Joining Bonus: 2.5L
Relocation Bonus: 1.8L (Only if we choose Pune)
Stocks: 0
Total comp (Salary + Variable + Joining Bonus ): 28L + 2.8L + 2.5L = 33.3L
Benefits: Standard (Internet, Fitness, Medical Insurance)
 
Points worth mentioning:
1. HR told that Avalara has the best work culture and will be offering promotions within 1.5 years if the performance is remarkable. 
2. Given option to chose either Pune(with relocation bonus) or remote

Thoughts/Questions:
1. Is the Base correct for the position offered? HR used the YOE as a primary point while negotiating. 
2. I would have asked 35L+ as base and would have started the negotiation. Totally messed up at negotiation.
3. Not having any other offers right now and cannot expect much promotion hike (not higher than 12%) from the current company. So planning to take it? Any suggestions.

About the Interview and Recruiting porcess:
1. Reached by HR through LinkedIn In-mail
2. Attended the Walk-In Interview in Bangalore
3. Continuous 2 hrs interview (Tech + HM) 
4. Breakfast, Lunch for the interview cadidates
5. Dinner with Team for the selected candidates

Note: I will add the interview experience soon
